ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard? [How many days have you p layed!?]
ygData.msgSnippet: all the people that played eq with me at work stopped playing... you realize what that means? i have to talk about other stuff with other people at work
ygData.messageBody:
all the people that played eq with me at work stopped playing... you realize
what that means? i have to talk about other stuff with other people at work

*cries*

message boards are seeing alot more of me since all this happened

Minkin
Annoying Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: January 12, 2001 10:16 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard? [How many days have you
p layed!?]


>
> Why EQ is a blessing from above, I tell you!
>


Not to mention: Think of the UV rays we did not expose ourselves to by
staying inside all summer and the lowered risk of skin cancer! And, if we
didn't have EQ we'd prolly run out of things to talk to our friends about
and god forbid we might actually work out and get in shape *shudders*...
hehe

Halana/Tani
